meanings.sent1: Her pimpled face made her feel self-conscious.
meanings.sent2: The teenager's pimpled skin cleared up after using a special cream.
meanings.sent3: Despite her pimpled cheeks, she still smiled brightly.
meanings.sent4: The moon's pimpled surface looked like a giant pizza crust.
meanings.sent5: The pimpled texture of the orange peel reminded her of tiny bumps.

meanings.sent1: He felt embarrassed about his pimpled forehead before the party.
meanings.sent2: The pimpled area on her chin was sore to touch.
meanings.sent3: The pimpled nose of the clown made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The pimpled landscape of the desert was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The pimpled appearance of the fruit indicated it was overripe.
